name: Santa's Skirmish
description:
Description

You play as Santa telling your elves to do their work, but then something happens, and you have to hunt down the culprits and put them to sleep, permanently.

Goal

Progress through your workshop and find the naughtiest person on your naughty list: the leader of the Anti-Santa Task Force!

Controls
  • WASD : move.
  • Left click: Use equipped item.
  • E: Drop a SURPRISE present (when your ammo has run out).
